Question
========

Every Saturday morning, Daan rolls a clean die. If he throws a 1 or 2 then he goes swimming. If he rolls a 3, 4, 5 or 6 then he goes he will ride his bike. What is the probability that out of the next five Saturdays he will do exactly two will go swimming?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,111
* 0,400
* 0,165
* 0,329
* 0,671

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0,111: Incorrect
* 0.400: Incorrect
* 0.165: Incorrect
* 0.329: Correct
* 0.671: Incorrect
